lead_paragraph: At government buildings in New York and at airports across the country, security was tightened yesterday within hours of the conviction of Sheik Omar Abdel Rahman and his followers in a bombing conspiracy trial. Federico F. Pena, the United States Transportation Secretary, who ordered heightened security at the nation's airports in August, ordered still more security measures yesterday.

headline.main: U.S. Steps Up Precautions At Its Offices And Airports
